title: Donating All Money Spent on Luxuries

content.question: Write an essay that argues your position on Singer’s argument that prosperous people should donate to overseas aid organizations such as UNICEF or Oxfam America all money not needed for the basic requirements of life.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that argues your position on Singer’s argument that prosperous people should donate to overseas aid organizations such as UNICEF or Oxfam America all money not needed for the basic requirements of life.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Write introductions and conclusions appropriate to the purpose and context of the rhetorical situation.
